dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
October 15, 2007 
Google, Inc 
Ann: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaint 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 
To Whom it may concern, 
My name is [private], I work for the Teaching Company. Below is a link to a blog that is posting inks to download our Understanding the Uriverse course, in violation of our copyright. 
httD firs pidshareebookss. blogspot. com12007109/u ndersta r ding-universe-introduction-to. htm 
Here is the DIV1CA statement: 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that lam the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 
Thank you for your assistance in getting these posts removed. I have listed my contact information below. Please contact me should you have any questions. 
Best regards, 
[private] 
Customer Relations Manager 
The Teaching Company 
[private]
Chantilly, Va [private]
[private]@teachco.com 
[private] 
[private]
